description: This file contains implementation of a TLS Connection Controller object, including functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the object. It handles TLS session management, object lifecycle, and internal component setup for the TLS protocol stack.

classes.name: TLS_CONN_CONTROLLER_OBJECT
classes.description: Main object representing the TLS Connection Controller component, encapsulating TLS session management and control functions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TlsCcoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new TLS Connection Controller object, initializes its members, and prepares it for use.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCcoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the TLS Connection Controller object and frees associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCcoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrols necessary internal components such as buffer descriptor and interface structures required for TLS operation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCcoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Connection Controller object, setting default property values and preparing it for operation.
